CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Collections.​SafeDictionary
System.​Collections.​Generic.​Dictionary​<KeyType, ValueType>
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Collections.​SafeDictionary​<KeyType, ValueType>

A variation of .NET's Dictionary class that uses null returns instead of exceptions.

  • Reading non-existent keys returns null (or the default for value types) instead of throwing an exception.

  • Using Add() on a preexisting key overwrites the value instead of throwing an exception.

Functions
Add
new public void Add (
KeyType key,
ValueType value
)

Adds a new value to the table, overwriting the previous value if it already existed.

Operators
this
new public ValueType this [
KeyType key
] { get; set }

An index operator.  When getting, returns null (or the default for value types) if the key doesn't exist instead of throwing an exception.  When setting, creates an entry for the key or overwrites the existing one if it doesn't exist.
